price: 21. Naf walbana waxay iman iyadoo uu la socdo (labo malag) mid hoggaaminaya iyo mid ku markhaati furaya.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
